meanings.definition: A society or club of women or girls, especially in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: Many students join sororities to make friends and participate in activities together.
meanings.sent2: The sororities on campus organize various events and fundraisers throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The sororities decided to have a pajama party to bond over their love for cozy nights.
meanings.sent4: In a way, sororities are like big families where members support and care for each other.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors and cheerful chants of sororities make them stand out during campus events.
